website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for travel use or to send to the daycare center.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
Fits up to to 3" thick mattress
cons: May run a bit small, so measure your mini crib carefully

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and my baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fit perfectly with my LA Baby 3 inch mattress. Machine washed and tumble low dried. It looked very small but it fits just right, maybe I'm used to looking at my kind size fitted sheets. Love the snug fit to prevent SID, no loose fabric at all. Very soft and comfortable, happy with the quality, the color looks exactly like the listing pictures. I picked Ecru which is a beige/cream color. Was debating between American Baby and TL Care, picked TL Care because it was cheaper as an add-on item and seems like the same quality. Gave it a try and love it. My baby loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Doleman

customer_reviews.title: Soft but too tight
customer_reviews.text: Really soft and the elastic is sewn very nicely but it's definitely too tight on the corners. It makes the pack and play mattress curl up on all 4 corners. I'm still debating on returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive option for MiClassic bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I got the MiClassic bassinet as a second one for the house, due to its portability and decent reviews. After I got it, I found the reviews for sheets were all over the place due to the size of the pads. I opted to get some mini crib sheets instead of ordering a bunch of bassinet sheets that were too small. These are bigger than you need, but they tuck under the mattress pads quite easily. For the price, I’m fine using these as a workaround for the bassinet. They’re soft as well. Good bargain for $5!
customer_reviews.author: mrsgsapothecary

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and does not shrink
customer_reviews.text: My little one tends to spit up often. Her one mini crib sheet would stink from her spit up. I was washing her sheet everyday. Mini crib sheets are hard to find in a store. I found this 100% cotton pink mini crib mattress sheet on here, and like the quality a lot. This mini crib sheet fits perfectly around the mattress corners. I have the thinner style for a mini crib mattress. The sheet is very soft and cozy. I have washed and dried this sheet three times now and the sheet has not shrunk at all.
customer_reviews.author: Angel27

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Fits standard playard mattress. It did NOT fit the board mattress that came with the pack n play. Because the board is sectioned for easy folding, the sheet would pull them close together leaving gaps around the edge. I ordered a pack n play mattress and it fits that great. We have a babytrend pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Leco

customer_reviews.title: These sheets are sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are sturdy and hold up well in the wash. The color in the photo is accurate to reality. These sheets are incredibly soft and hold up well with no shrinkage or pilling in cold wash and low heat dry. They are not "hot" like some microfiber sheets are. I am very happy with my purchase and would purchase these sheets all over again (and probably will soon in a different color)! I totally recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Missing one ordered, great minisheets
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 diff colors, 4 total. Received the 3 one of each color, but not the second green. Didnt know until i set up the crib and opened the package to get a sheet out Great sheets for my son, fits his dream on me mini mattress perfectly. Just make sure you got all you ordered when you receive them. Its too late for me lol
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product for the price is phenomenal! It’s super soft, has good elastics, and the size is great. The elastics are tight enough to fit a pack n play mattress, but theirs enough material for a mini crib mattress. I’m using it with my crib. Right out of the package the softness surprised me, and really the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Julia P

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable, breathable
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our little one because they have stars on them. They're soft and don't retain heat well so it's perfect if you live somewhere warm like we do. They're comfortable and we don't have to worry about our little one accidentally getting herself into trouble with these. We like them enough we bought a total of 9 of them. They wash well in a sink in the event of a diaper accident.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby by the Sea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and colors choices are many
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought these to fit a dog bed 20x24. Works perfectly. Use corner mattress clips to keep them from scratching it off. Very soft. Love the color options. I hope they last but since I’m not using for a baby they could wear differently. Exactly what I was looking for so I don’t have to wash the bed so often.
customer_reviews.author: donnakat

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This fits the mattress I bought for my graco pack n play. The material is very thin and you can easily feel the crinkly mattress underneath. It doesn’t seem like my baby minds though. Overall inexpensive but also mediocre quality
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: Mini crib sheet👶🏽👶🏽👶🏽
customer_reviews.text: We bought a mini Baby crib because we didn’t wanna take up too much space, And the sheets fit perfectly I’m on able to find the right size in stores so I ordered these to try and they work great
customer_reviews.author: hershee_galore

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very soft
customer_reviews.text: Despite the headline claiming this is jersey, it is definitely not a soft jersey. It's more of coarse jersey. The pattern is cute and it washes up well, but to me the word jersey implies a certain softness that this sheet is definitely lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Kplandish

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and Rough
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Not soft and full of slubs and bumps. They seem to be woven, rather than the 100% knit cotton jersey stated on the package.
customer_reviews.author: Compulsive Researcher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the quality of these sheets, especially considering the price. They are soft and comfy. My favorite part, they have enough elastic to actually hold onto the mattress. They really are perfect. I would buy again and would not buy any other sheets.
customer_reviews.author: A Hall

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This just barely fits our standard pack n play. The seams don't quite line up right but it fits well enough to be safe for baby. It looks fine for the price. Its a soft cotton material. Overall, worth the 5 bucks that I paid to have a back up pack n play sheet.
customer_reviews.author: ETop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Value sheet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thin mattress cover. It has a good pattern. However it’s very thin with a low thread count. It’s definitely a value option and has a low cost price tag which matches the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Milton

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable condition right out of the package :(
customer_reviews.text: The price must have been too good to be true :( I received it today and right out of the package it has a tear and small hole in the middle of the dang thing!
customer_reviews.author: Dara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Take the dimensions seriously, it runs smaller in size.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely on the smaller side in it’s stretching capabilities. If your bed is slightly bigger than the dimensions Amazon provides for this product, your bed will be too big in practicality.
customer_reviews.author: Jed Cangco

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sheet! It is extremely soft and stretchy. I worried about ordering a sheet online because I could not feel the texture before buying but was extremely pleased once the product arrived. I would definitely recommend this sheet to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lovinglife

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Way softer than I expected. All the other crib sheets I have feel like paper but these are actually really soft!!! Fit on my dream on me mini crib mattress without an issue. For the price, they are great! Only got one to test out but Will be ordering more soon..
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk terribly in the wash
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3– the gray, yellow and white. For some strange reason, the white one shrunk beyond compare when all three were washed according to the instructions. How annoying.. Can’t expect mush if you only pay $6 for each though. I should have known.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Olaya

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality but a little small
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Graco Pack and Play. It's a bit *too* snug and pulls the ends of the pad up. It'll work with baby's weight holding it down, but it's not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: So soft on baby's skin
customer_reviews.text: It does stretch well! I had to stretch it to get it on the mattress, but it fits nicely, is very soft....on the pack n play right now.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t sleep on them so no good for my baby
customer_reviews.text: After first wash they became very stiff and there not very high grade thread
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted and expected
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to say about a sheet, it was what I wanted, the color I wanted, and it fit the pack'n play just right. As a grandma I will not be using it often so I cannot reply to the durability.
customer_reviews.author: a mother

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Fits the mini crib mattress perfectly and is the color we needed. I bought 3 because babies make messes lol
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and fits mini crib mattress perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my mini crib mattress perfectly! It’s very soft and stretchy. I have washed and dried it, and unlike another sheet I bought it did NOT shrink! Still fits perfectly and doesn’t cause mattress to bunch up leaving unsafe gaps on the sides. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: K. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a recommendation from customer who uses this size as a pillow cover for a wedge foam snoring pillow. Works great and at least half cost of a pillow cover designed for the foam wedge pillows
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great value, comfort and softness
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and very comfortable and soft for baby. Machine wash, tumble dry low. Love it!💕😊
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great for pack-n-play
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our pack-n-play and was not disappointed. I had read some reviews about them not fitting well, but they fit the pack-n-play mat perfect. Wash well, hold their size and shape and are nice and soft. Would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Deemer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money it shirks ALOT!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so mad this was perfect till I washed and dried it and now it’s to small for my son’s bed :/ ending using it for my dogs bed and bought the right one at Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Benson

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste ur money
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't even fit the bed. What a waste threw it in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Nyar Daniel-Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mini crib
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my son's mini crib mattress and they are PERFECT! They fit perfectly, the feel so soft.. 5/5 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bennitt

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft as i thought it would be. Its a thin sheet. I got it for daycare,it will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sbird

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these sheets for our portable crib! They are so soft and GREAT PRICE POINT!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit a twin mattress! The material is rough and it was not comfortable for a child’s skin.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Baez

customer_reviews.title: These Last! Wash great
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and fit great. These wash up nice as well, have gotten atleast 30 washing’s and still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi and Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Came just as shown and arrived quickly thanks to prime. The pink is the perfect color to match my baby’s mini crib too. It’s soft and has been durable for me. I am definitely happy and recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Phaithe Reyes-Leonti

customer_reviews.title: Barely fits
customer_reviews.text: Could be better. These run small. BARELY fits my mini crib mattress that’s only 3 inches thick. You get what you pay for. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how soft it was . Color was just like the picture. Great find !
customer_reviews.author: Sophia S.

customer_reviews.title: Soft as a baby's....
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2 inch 24x38 mattress topper perfectly without rolling the edges of it up. They both are in my Graco pack n play. There were no fuzz balls after washing. It definitely could have fit a much thicker mattress. Good quality material. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft but very thin!! Curious to see how long and how many washes this holds up!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Vallem

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: This sheet was perfect for our mini crib mattress. It fit perfect and it was so soft. It held up very nicely after washing and only got softer. Very nice for little babes.
customer_reviews.author: The goat lady

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully soft staple
customer_reviews.text: I plan to buy more. Very soft and simple option for a mini crib sheet. It’s a bit of a struggle to get it over the Davinci mattress I added to our babyletto mini crib, but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth BaurTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It fits my 3in1 Arm's reach Ideal-eeze
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my arm's reach 3in1 ideal-eeze co-sleeper bassinet. It fits the mattress perfectly. I bought 2 different prints and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jack-the-Bichon

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice soft sheet for my baby’s crib. And the price is right to have a few on back up for laundry switches.
customer_reviews.author: oriana albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Price reflects quality
customer_reviews.text: These get pretty misshapen and don’t wash well. For the price they aren’t bad, but are pretty flimsy. Don’t count on these washing well or holding up over time. Great for a quick purchase that’s inexpensive, however.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Survived the first wash with no issues. Pattern is quite nice. A little thin but soft. Fits the miclassic bassinet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very cute in my son's crib. Matches his crib perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sally S

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great little sheet! Fits perfectly on our mini crib mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice color
customer_reviews.text: Nice fitted small crib sheet; ONLY for a small crib size
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare
customer_reviews.text: I bought the green color. Really soft-nice quality. Needed for daycare mini crib.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in blue and gray, and they are the softest! I love them. They also stretch a lot. I thought they were a tight fit with our 4" mattress, but I recently got a 2" memory foam topper and these stretch to cover both. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Shrinks after wash, barely fit the mattress it said it would. Also, my baby had a skin reaction (not sure if it was just my child or if it is sensitive to babies smooth skin). Just a heads up, not sure where it was manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: BML

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This crib sheet fit my Naturepedic mini crib mattress perfectly. It's also soft and a quality fabric. I ordered the color Celery, it's the perfect soft mint color I needed to match my nursery. I'm so happy TL Care makes mini crib sheets since those are hard to find!
customer_reviews.author: EGC

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and fits the port a crib just fine
customer_reviews.author: KarenKB

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and soft
customer_reviews.text: Soft,good quality and well made.i originally purchased it for my Chicco portable bassinet,it is a big bigger for the size of the mattress but ones it is tucked in it looks beautiful and it securely fits thanks to the elastic that's around the sheet.Great product for the price,I will order one more in a different color
customer_reviews.author: vesi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sheets
customer_reviews.text: Well made and cheap price. Will buy more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needed this for daycare. It fit the mini crib perfectly. It is very soft and is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hanser

customer_reviews.title: Great fit on mini cribs
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, fits great on mini cribs, and great price! The color is true to the picture. We bought 3 sets so we wouldn't have to be washing them in the middle of the night if accidents happened. Will buy again when/if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, good value
customer_reviews.text: We needed a mini crib sheet for daycare, and it is so hard to find an affordable one. This one is soft and fits well, so it functions for our needs, but I wish they had better colors or patters.
customer_reviews.author: SER

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets for daycare
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for my sons daycare crib mattress. After 5 months of daily use, with a weekly washing in the washing machine normal cycle and drying they still look good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Yellsy

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft
customer_reviews.text: Shrunk a little in the dryer, but super soft and perfect for the mini crib i have
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with finding sheets to fit the pack and play tight! This is perfect. It's thin but I'm ok with that. I'll buy more
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: I love putting my baby down to sleep in his mini ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft, comfy and cute! I love putting my baby down to sleep in his mini crib with a sheet that has moons and stars on it. It’s been washed a lot and hasn’t shrunk or faded.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great overall....
customer_reviews.text: Works well and washes well. What else can one ask?
customer_reviews.author: Carol Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughter’s mini rocking cradle perfectly!!! I love it. I would most definitely recommend 😊
customer_reviews.author: Shontay

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Super soft material, well made, perfect for my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Senia

customer_reviews.title: Wish they made them in the regular crib size!
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft, and the quality is great for the price. Just wish they made them for regular crib sizes
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits my mini crib mattress and I think will serve my needs well. I gave it 4 stars only because it’s very thin material, but it was inexpensive so I shouldn’t be surprised at the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for a playpen or mini crib
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for a playpen or mini crib very soft and colors won’t fade after washed
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fernanda Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sheet and nice nuteral gray color. I actually use it to cover my coffee table so it will not be scratched by toys. Holds up great even under a harsher than intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: It fits a pack n play mattress!
customer_reviews.text: l bought this cover sheet for the foam mattress that l purchased for my little one’s pack n play. It fit the mattress perfectly and l like that it is cotton and soft. color pink is a bonus ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lorena C.

customer_reviews.title: Fit my matteress pad perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time finding soft crib sheet that fit the mattress, but this one worked perfectly and they wash up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: A.DUANE MCFARLAND

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on a pack and play mattress. Very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cute. Very good quality and it fits my bassinet very well.
customer_reviews.author: Christelle

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve yet to use it but did wash it and seems to be as good as any other crib sheet I’ve purchased in the past. Softer then others I’ve had
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: For the price its great, fits 3 inch mattress perfectly. Cute color as well
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Accurate size
customer_reviews.text: Soft! Fits perfect and price is great for having to change bed sheets so often!
customer_reviews.author: Shay T

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cute, just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Cute colors, stretchy & soft. Excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good sheet!
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets for small mattresses crib! I have 5 sets in various colors / patterns. If your crib is the right size, buy them!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Used it to cover wall mounted tv
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this to cover a wall mounted tv on my patio.. works great
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: The sheet fits the mattress perfectly and it is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Terriesdoll

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sheets!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice sheets! The softness last wash after wash....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheet for mini crib
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of this sheet. It’s soft, washes well, and is a great fit for our mini crib mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Gelhaus

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Soft, perfect size for my sons mini crib. I thought it would be scratchy, but nope it's very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets for my daughter’s mini crib. I really like the material. They’re so soft and fit the mattress very nicely. I’ll definitely be stocking up on these!
customer_reviews.author: Sb1983Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Mini crib sheets
customer_reviews.text: Good quality crib sheets at reasonable price. These are for mini cribs so it won't fit the standard cribs. Material is very soft and comfortable for little babies. It washes very well too! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: silverblaze

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I have the Davinci mini crib and these fit great on the mini mattress. It’s soft and stretchy 100% cotton material. Fast shipping too. Will be ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: It's a tight fit on the mattress. It is soft and the green is nice. I have noticed that once it gets stained, it's hard to get it out. But for the price, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at tight perfect fit. The sheet is soft, so is the color. Washed it before using. No complaints. Would buy again. Hope it was helpful
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib sheet if you want to go with a neutral nursery theme or just want a simple sheet. It’s very soft and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Product shrinks
customer_reviews.text: Shrunk didn't fit even though product review says it does
customer_reviews.author: diane gardner

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, but see through. Not sure if they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirl78

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are perfect for a mini crib or pack and play. I like the gender neutral colors and they wash well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Sheets are very very thin, the cheapest I could find & nothing is wrong besides the fact that they're thin/:
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Portillo

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet review
customer_reviews.text: Love this sheet! It’s so soft and comfy for my sweet baby!
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these for the daycare that my daughter attends. The owner had been looking everywhere for new sheets (the ones she had where from 2011), but everywhere wanted 20-30 dollars per sheet! These are amazing and perfect for their use.
customer_reviews.author: Loving2016

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Fits my mimi crib perfectly, true to color. Haven’t had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tajikistan

product_meta.title: TL Care 100% Natural Cotton Value Jersey Knit Fitted Portable/Mini-Crib Sheet, Blue, Soft Breathable, for Boys and Girls
product_meta.description: Color:BlueOur 100% Cotton value jersey knit fitted mini crib sheet provides comfort for the next generation. Fits standard 24" x 38" mini crib mattresses and can fit up to 3" thick mattresses; Deep pockets with elastic all around provide a snug and secure fit for baby's comfort. Machine washable cold with gentle cycle , tumble dry low for best results.
feature_bullets: 100% Jersey Cotton. Measures 24 inches x 38 inches
SOFT. Our Value Jersey portable mini sheets offer a warm, tee shirt like feel for exceptional comfort
SELECTION. Available in a variety of colors to match any style
QUALITY. Snug fit up to 3" thick mattress and elastic all around. Machine washable and dryable
VALUE. Quality and style at a great price

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,319 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
